name: Oly
description:
Controls:

UP arrow | Right Click | W | O | Left Trigger - Arms

DOWN arrow | Left Click | D | K | Right Trigger - Legs

P | Start - Pause

Back - Activate Gamepad

Trailer

This version of the game is a prototype.

The name will probably be changed. It's was just a combination from our main inspiration, Olli Olli, by Roll7, with Olympics.

We still don't have anyone making the music for it, so it features the following music, temporarily:

Artist - Song

ACDC - TNT

House of Pain - I'm a Swing-It

Guttermouth - I'm Destroying the World

Run DMC - My Adidas

Dub Pistols - Cyclone
